definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical diagnosis of B-mode ultrasound to gynecologic acute abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨B型超声对妇科急腹症的临床诊断价值。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the treatment and clinical diagnosis of right lower-abdominal mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨右下腹包块的临床诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features and treatment of traumatic cerebral intraventricular hemorrhage(TIVH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性脑室出血的临床特点和治疗方法。

sentences.english: Non -stress test has a higher clinical value in foretelling perinatal prognosis ofp olyhydramnios.
sentences.chinese: 无激惹试验在其预测围生儿预后具有较好的临床价值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anatomical structures of the posterior column of the acetabulum and the related clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨髋臼后柱的解剖学结构及其相关临床意义。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinicopathological feature and prognosis of meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究脑膜瘤临床病理特征及预后。

sentences.english: To investigate clinical feature and therapeutic approach of traumatic dural sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨外伤性颅内静脉窦损伤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical characteristics and treatment options of cutaneous vessel abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结儿童皮肤脉管异常的临床特点和治疗选择。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of supraglottic horizontal partial laryngectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨喉声门上水平部分切除术的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Diagnosis was established on clinical findings and the barium enema examination.
sentences.chinese: 诊断主要依靠临床表现和钡剂灌肠透视。

sentences.english: The cardinal clinical manifestation was painless solid enlargement of the testis.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸无痛性肿大为其主要临床表现。

sentences.english: Results The rehabilitation treatment after TKR is very satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 结果术后严格的康复治疗取得了满意的临床效果。

sentences.english: To explore the significance of adenosine deaminase in patients with tuberculous pleurisy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腺苷脱氨酶在结核性胸膜炎中的临床意义。

sentences.english: The clinical data of 36 cases of severe pulmonary contusion was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对36例严重肺挫伤患者的临床资料进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of B-Type ultrasonic diagnosis of clonorchiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨利用B型超声诊断华支睾吸虫病的临床价值。

definition: Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine

pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 gu3 sui3 liu2
